3: After returning from the mission with the CUB, the Gray Ravens have all completed their situation reports.
—And that's the end of our reports. Commandant, are we dismissed?
Now that this is done, we should return to help with Asimov's project.
In that case, Commandant, have a good rest.
As the three of them are about to leave, a familiar voice halts them.
Excuse me—
Ayla? Is there something you need from us?
Oh, you're all here as well! That's great.
We're actually on our way to Asimov to help with his...
Oh, don't mind that. He's busy with something else currently.
Asimov is dropping his research halfway through to work on something else...?
I bet you wouldn't have guessed that he's helping the WGAA with our Lunar New Year decorations!

2: No way! We're talking about Asimov, right?

3: What have you done to make him comply...
That's a secret!
Ayla passes you the beautifully printed paper bag in her hands.
I think this suits Gray Raven quite well. That's why I was thinking about you guys.
You see two lengthy, red sheets with large, clean calligraphy on them.
I think I've seen it on the surface once... One of the decorations for Lunar New Year.
That's right. You put them by the two sides of the door.
Lee flips through the couplets, examining them.
What's the point of sticking paper with words next to a door? And what is it that's written on them?
They are wishes for the new year, written in short and rhythmic, melodic phrases.

2: They do feel like poetry and songs.

3: I bet they'll sound great if you sing them with music.
True... If Selena were here, she wouldn't hesitate to perform for us here and now. She would, I'm sure...
Ayla's smile freezes as she thinks about her disappeared teammate.
Ayla...
Ayla slightly taps herself on the face, stopping herself from the downward spiral.
Selena must be waiting for us to find her somewhere out there... That's why I won't give up on her.
Of course. Our mission to reclaim Earth is far from over. We must keep going for the coming year.
Liv takes the couplets from Ayla's hands and nods.
Leave this to us—we just need to place them next to a door, right?
Yep! Put them up with some oomph!
Lucia takes the tools Ayla passes her and smiles.
Commandant, do you remember? This is just like our last mission when we all finished decorating the place together.

2: Of course I remember. It's just a while ago.

3: I envy you guys—you have so many wonderful adventures!
...Although, things aren't always that wonderful.
But as long as we are here with each other, there will be... wonder.
Well, if we're going to decorate Commandant's room, we should start working on it...
Of course! Commandant, you're the one who represents Gray Raven.
I'm glad you like it!
Leave the one on top to me. I'm probably more suited to deal with that height.
I'll leave it to you, then, Lee...
We can always count on you, Lee...
Within seconds, the couplets Ayla brought you are now properly placed outside your room.
Hmm—it looks—fantastic!
...The calligraphy is beautiful! And the words are... meaningful, it seems.
Right? You couldn't have guessed it, but they are written by Yuan Ye, the CUB from earlier!
You're saying that the AI system can write couplets? I wish I had opened it up to study when I had the chance...
That... is a secret.
Ayla crosses her arms and nods.
Alright! The Gray Ravens have received their couplets, and I'm on my way to give the other squads their own!
Before I go... Happy New Year! Commandant and the Gray Ravens, have a wonderful new year!

2: You too, Ayla! Happy New Year!

3: Hopefully, Ayla's and everyone's wishes... will all come true in the coming year.
—Happy New Year!
